column1: Have paid for flights, hotel accommodations from Las Vegas NV to Cancun March 8. Should we be concerned? Any alerts?
So far nothing reported in the entire country, as far as I know.
Have you read the other posts on this same subject??Check the search featurehttps:/…105257024https://www.tripadvisor.ca/ShowTopic-g150807…Edited: 11:16 pm, February 10, 2020
and please read the proper Health websites (e.g. CDC)Trip Advisor is not a proper Health research websitehttps:/…cases-in-us.html
